CC's Conversions is proud to release the Aves to celebrate the beautiful and unique history of the Tevarin culture. This medium helmet honors traditional stylings while perfectly fitting a Human head. Red highlights provide colorful and vibrant accents to the black and white plating, giving the helmet a bold and dynamic feel worthy of this great species.
